channel.title: Plank on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Plank on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Plank
item.description: one by one she pops the stars in my eyes in the needle goes slowly through my brown skies a prick a stick wincing yet grinning she twists that needle so true and straight watching me squirm without much debate I kick and yell and beg for more I yearn to know what she has in store I barter for her pain like a fool taking me to her school excrement in her stool I smell like a fat fool with a little drool spin that metal how I jerk in glee.
